rental_cancelation_policies.body:
Cancellation Policy: 
In case of cancelation the downpayment paid upon booking is non-refundable.

body_translations.en:
Cancellation Policy: 
In case of cancelation the downpayment paid upon booking is non-refundable.
body_translations.fr:
Annulation : 
En cas d'annulation l'acompte payé lors de la réservation ne sera pas remboursé.
